analyzed: shastam bde dang bkra shis la //

analyzed: sha ta phra dang rno ba la //

analyzed: d'anta shintu grol ba la //

original: shi ta chu grang 'khor mang la //
analyzed: shi ta chu grang 'khor mang la //

analyzed: sh'i tam / tsanda kha ba skyes //

analyzed: 'khyags dang grang dang le lo la //

original: g'a ti tam ni //
analyzed: g'a ti tam ni //

original: spel ba dang // mnan dang 'tshe ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: spel ba dang // mnan dang 'tshe ba rnams la'o //

analyzed: tsooll'a ta ni mi g-yo dang // gangg'a'i tsi la ring du 'tsho //

original: dza ganti ni rlung sa 'gro //
analyzed: dza ganti ni rlung sa 'gro //

analyzed: dza ga t'a ni 'gro bas //

analyzed: sdeb sbyor dbye ba chu la'o //

original: dza yanta ni brgya byin skyes //
analyzed: dza yanta ni brgya byin skyes //

original: bde 'byung la'o dza yant'i //
analyzed: bde 'byung la'o dza yant'i //

analyzed: nyi ma'i 'khyims dang da yi ta //

original: dzee'i m'u ta ni brgya byin sprin //
analyzed: dzee'i m'u ta ni brgya byin sprin //

translated: The hermit is one who increases and burns.🔽 The bearer is one who is black,

original: ha panti ni sol ba dang // so ba dang ni me tog dang // yal ga can gyi dbye ba la //
analyzed: ha panti ni sol ba dang // so ba dang ni me tog dang // yal ga can gyi dbye ba la //
translated: has teeth, flowers, and branches.🔽 The harīta is one who distributes ornaments,

original: h'a r'i ta ni rgyan 'gyed dang // bya dang thub pa'i dbye ba la //
analyzed: h'a r'i ta ni rgyan 'gyed dang // bya dang thub pa'i dbye ba la //
translated: and is a subdivision of birds and sages.

original: hri shi tam ni rnam par 'dzum //
analyzed: hri shi tam ni rnam par 'dzum //
translated: The śiṣṭa is one who smiles,

original: thogs dang dga' ba sbu long 'dud //
analyzed: thogs dang dga' ba sbu long 'dud //
translated: has a goiter, and bows with joy.🔽 The kṣārita is one who drips,

original: ksh'a ri ta ni 'dzag pa dang // 'gyur dang aa bi shapta la //
analyzed: ksh'a ri ta ni 'dzag pa dang // 'gyur dang aa bi shapta la //
translated: changes, and is not complete.🔽 The aṅgarita is one who is burned,

original: aam ga ri tam tshig pa dang // pa l'a sha yi yal 'dab la //
analyzed: aam ga ri tam tshig pa dang // pa l'a sha yi yal 'dab la //
translated: and has leaves of the palāśa tree.

original: aa ti mukta dpyid dang shing //
analyzed: aa ti mukta dpyid dang shing //
translated: The ati-mukta is spring and a tree,

original: ti ni pa dang cha med la //
analyzed: ti ni pa dang cha med la //
translated: and is a subdivision of the tinduka.🔽 The ati-hita is a great fear,

original: aa ty'a hi tam 'jigs chen dang // srog la bltos med bya ba la //
analyzed: aa ty'a hi tam 'jigs chen dang // srog la bltos med bya ba la //
translated: and an action that does not regard life.🔽 The ati-kṣipta is a change of others,

original: aa ti kshibha gzhan 'gyur dang // smon pa'o aa na ha ti ni //
analyzed: aa ti kshibha gzhan 'gyur dang // smon pa'o aa na ha ti ni //
translated: and a wish. The ana-hatin

original: sngon med gos dang gos sar la'o //
analyzed: sngon med gos dang gos sar la'o //
translated: is a garment that has not been worn before, and a garment.

original: aa nu ma ti zla ba nya //
analyzed: aa nu ma ti zla ba nya //
translated: The anu-matī is the moon and the sun,

original: gang ba dang ni rjes gnang la'o //
analyzed: gang ba dang ni rjes gnang la'o //
translated: and is one who is full and gives permission.

original: aantarga ta dbus dang nang //
analyzed: aantarga ta dbus dang nang //
translated: Antargata is in the middle or inside.

original: thob dang mi dran pa la'o //
analyzed: thob dang mi dran pa la'o //
translated: Apahrāsa is in the case of loss of memory.

original: aa pa tsi ti mchod pa dang // des byed zad dang nyams pa la //
analyzed: aa pa tsi ti mchod pa dang // des byed zad dang nyams pa la //
translated: Apaciti is worship and that which causes it.

original: aa p'a bri ta bkab pa dang // rang rgyud aa bhi dz'a ta ni //
analyzed: aa p'a bri ta bkab pa dang // rang rgyud aa bhi dz'a ta ni //
translated: Apaviddha is concealed and avyabhicāri is one’s own continuum.

original: bzhad pa rigs pa ku l'i na //
analyzed: bzhad pa rigs pa ku l'i na //
translated: Abhijata is a laugh and kula is a family.

original: thob pa'i gzugs dag la yang ngo //
analyzed: thob pa'i gzugs dag la yang ngo //
translated: Abhiyukta is also the form of attainment.

original: aa bhi yug+ta zhe sdang sngom //🔽mngon par brtson dang lhur byed pa'o //
analyzed: aa bhi yug+ta zhe sdang sngom // mngon par brtson dang lhur byed pa'o //
translated: Abhiyukta is hatred and restraint.🔽Abhiyoga is exertion and abhiṣeka is consecration.

original: aa bhi n'i ta rigs pa dang // 'dus byas dang ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: aa bhi n'i ta rigs pa dang // 'dus byas dang ni bzod pa'o //
translated: Abhihita is reason, the compounded and patience.

original: aa bhi shasti 'jig rten gyis //
analyzed: aa bhi shasti 'jig rten gyis //
translated: Abhiśasta is despised by the world.

original: smod dang slong dang mngon par sbyong //
analyzed: smod dang slong dang mngon par sbyong //
translated: Abhiyoga is to apply oneself and abhiṣeka is consecration.

original: aartha pa ti sa bdag dang // dbang phyug mi 'am ci dang dbyangs //
analyzed: aartha pa ti sa bdag dang // dbang phyug mi 'am ci dang dbyangs //
translated: Artha is a lord of men, Īśvara, a kinnara and a melody.

original: aa ba gi tam yongs su brjod //
analyzed: aa ba gi tam yongs su brjod //
translated: Avagīta is fully expressed.

original: yang @192b yang lta dang rnam par smod //
analyzed: yang @192b yang lta dang rnam par smod //
translated: Avadya is repeatedly seen and criticized.

original: aa wa dhasta yongs su bkrus //
analyzed: aa wa dhasta yongs su bkrus //
translated: Avadāta is completely washed.

original: smad dang kun nas phye mar byas //
analyzed: smad dang kun nas phye mar byas //
translated: Avakīrṇa is despised and completely pulverized.

original: ae ba d'a tam dkar dang ser //
analyzed: ae ba d'a tam dkar dang ser //
translated: Evadatta is white and yellow.

original: rnam par dag dang rab mchog la //
analyzed: rnam par dag dang rab mchog la //
translated: [The fourth is] in the sense of pure, excellent,

original: shes dang bkag pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: shes dang bkag pa la yang ngo //
translated: and knowing, and also in the sense of prohibited.

original: aa wa si tam 'gro dang mtha' //
analyzed: aa wa si tam 'gro dang mtha' //
translated: [The fifth is] in the sense of going, and also in the sense of end,

original: tshe dang ldan dang rnal 'byor dbye //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan dang rnal 'byor dbye //
translated: and in the sense of long-lived, and in the sense of yoga.

original: ring du 'tsho ba dag la'o //🔽audzdzrimbhi ta spyod pa rgyas //
analyzed: ring du 'tsho ba dag la'o // audzdzrimbhi ta spyod pa rgyas //
translated: [The sixth is] in the sense of long life.🔽[The seventh is] in the sense of conduct, and also in the sense of expanding.

original: au nga sthi ta spyod pa rgyal //
analyzed: au nga sthi ta spyod pa rgyal //
translated: [The eighth is] in the sense of conduct, and also in the sense of victorious.

original: smon lam dang ni sgo skyong la //
analyzed: smon lam dang ni sgo skyong la //
translated: [The ninth is] in the sense of prayer, and also in the sense of door-keeper.

original: aa d+gra hi ta nyer bkod dang // bcings dang bzung ba dag la'o //
analyzed: aa d+gra hi ta nyer bkod dang // bcings dang bzung ba dag la'o //
translated: [The tenth is] in the sense of placed near, and also in the sense of bound and seized.

original: au p'a kri ta mchod sbyin la //
analyzed: au p'a kri ta mchod sbyin la //
translated: [The eleventh is] in the sense of sacrifice,

original: gsad bya'i phyugs dang nye bar phan //
analyzed: gsad bya'i phyugs dang nye bar phan //
translated: and in the sense of animal to be killed, and also in the sense of benefit.

original: au pa tsi ta mnyam gzhag dang ; bsags dang yang dag 'byor pa la //
analyzed: au pa tsi ta mnyam gzhag dang ; bsags dang yang dag 'byor pa la //
translated: [The twelfth is] in the sense of equipoise, and also in the sense of accumulated, and in the sense of fully possessed.

original: au p'a hi ta me dang skyed //
analyzed: au p'a hi ta me dang skyed //
translated: [The thirteenth is] in the sense of fire, and also in the sense of produced.

original: kun nas btags pa rnams la'o //🔽au pa raksha mun pas khyab //
analyzed: kun nas btags pa rnams la'o // au pa raksha mun pas khyab //
translated: [The fourteenth is] in the sense of completely designated.🔽[The fifteenth is] in the sense of darkness,

original: zla ba nyi ma 'phongs bye brag / sgra gcan la yang blta bar bya //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma 'phongs bye brag / sgra gcan la yang blta bar bya //
translated: and also in the sense of moon, sun, and Rāhu.

original: au pa batti bsten pa dang // so sor go bar byed pa la //
analyzed: au pa batti bsten pa dang // so sor go bar byed pa la //
translated: [The sixteenth is] in the sense of reliance, and also in the sense of making understood.

original: 'grogs pa'o aulli li tam ni //
analyzed: 'grogs pa'o aulli li tam ni //
translated: [The seventeenth is] in the sense of companionship.

original: kun tu bkram dang srab mor byas //
analyzed: kun tu bkram dang srab mor byas //
translated: They are spread out and thin.🔽

original: drang srong gis brjod nga rgyal 'doms //
analyzed: drang srong gis brjod nga rgyal 'doms //
translated: The sage said, “Conceit is taught.

original: rtse mo dra ba g-yo ba'i dbye //
analyzed: rtse mo dra ba g-yo ba'i dbye //
translated: The peak, the net, the moving division,

original: aee r'a ba ta glang chen dkar //
analyzed: aee r'a ba ta glang chen dkar //
translated: the elephant of the Airāvata,🔽the high-minded Nāga, the long Airāvata,

original: gdeng can mtho ba n'a ram ga / aee r'a ba tam ring po dang // thang shing dbang dang mda' stan la //
analyzed: gdeng can mtho ba n'a ram ga / aee r'a ba tam ring po dang // thang shing dbang dang mda' stan la //
translated: the lord of the teak tree, the arrow seat,

original: aee r'a ba t'i glog 'od ldan //
analyzed: aee r'a ba t'i glog 'od ldan //
translated: the Airāvata with lightning light,🔽the division of the clouds, the sun,

original: sprin gyi dbye ba nyi ma dang // s'a la'i 'dab dang 'od ldan pa //
analyzed: sprin gyi dbye ba nyi ma dang // s'a la'i 'dab dang 'od ldan pa //
translated: the leaf of the Sāla tree, the radiant one,

original: ka la dhoo ta ca co sgrogs //
analyzed: ka la dhoo ta ca co sgrogs //
translated: the Kalahaṃsa, the one that cries out,

original: gser dang dngul dag la yang ngo //
analyzed: gser dang dngul dag la yang ngo //
translated: and also in gold and silver.

original: ku murba t'i ku mud ldan //
analyzed: ku murba t'i ku mud ldan //
translated: The Kumuda, the one with the kumuda,

original: ku mud mar dang ku mud can //
analyzed: ku mud mar dang ku mud can //
translated: the kumuda butter, the one with the kumuda,

original: ku ha ri tam sgra dang ni //
analyzed: ku ha ri tam sgra dang ni //
translated: the Kuharita sound,

original: ku sha'i 'dab ma la yang 'dod //
analyzed: ku sha'i 'dab ma la yang 'dod //
translated: and also in the kuśa leaf.🔽The jewel, the gold, the group,🔽the black powder, the pale one,

original: rin chen gser dang tshogs can dang // phye ma nag dang skya nar dang // m'a sa'i lo ma la yang ngo //
analyzed: rin chen gser dang tshogs can dang // phye ma nag dang skya nar dang // m'a sa'i lo ma la yang ngo //
translated: and also in the leaves of the Māsa.

original: gandha ba t'i chang dang sa //
analyzed: gandha ba t'i chang dang sa //
translated: The Gandhabhāṣa, the wine and the scent,

original: grong dang chu dang sbyar ba'i dri //
analyzed: grong dang chu dang sbyar ba'i dri //
translated: the scent mixed with water and town.

original: ga rutman ta bya khyung bya //
analyzed: ga rutman ta bya khyung bya //
translated: Garuda, and Garutmat.🔽Grihapati, and Grhavasin,

original: gri ha pa ti khyim gnas dang // ra ty'a dh'a na pa tri na //
analyzed: gri ha pa ti khyim gnas dang // ra ty'a dh'a na pa tri na //
translated: Ratnadhana, and Ratnapati,

original: tsakr'a hu t'i dpung pa ring //🔽'khor dang sreg blugs gang ba la //🔽tsanhra kanta nor bu bu'i dbye //🔽zla ba chu shel kee ra ba //
analyzed: tsakr'a hu t'i dpung pa ring // 'khor dang sreg blugs gang ba la // tsanhra kanta nor bu bu'i dbye // zla ba chu shel kee ra ba //
translated: Chakra, and Diraha,🔽Dhanu, and Dhanurdhara,🔽Candra, and Chandraketu,

original: tsarma n'a t'i chu klung gi / dbye ba dang ni chu shing la //
analyzed: tsarma n'a t'i chu klung gi / dbye ba dang ni chu shing la //
translated: Karavira, and Karaviraka,

original: ts'a tu dra t'a zhes bya ba //
analyzed: ts'a tu dra t'a zhes bya ba //
translated: Charmanvati, and Charmanvat,🔽Chatradhara, and Chatraka,

original: chu dang ri yi khyad par dang // 'bab chu k'a ra t'i zhes dang // zla ba nye bar gnas la brjod //🔽tsi tra gupta dbyug 'dzin dang // de'i yi ge pa la'o //
analyzed: chu dang ri yi khyad par dang // 'bab chu k'a ra t'i zhes dang // zla ba nye bar gnas la brjod // tsi tra gupta dbyug 'dzin dang // de'i yi ge pa la'o //
translated: Kara, and Karavira,🔽Citragupta, and Danda,

original: de b'a k'irti gtum po dang // @193a * //
analyzed: de b'a k'irti gtum po dang // @193a * //
translated: Devakirti, and Devagupta,

original: n'a pi ta dang bya rog sgra //
analyzed: n'a pi ta dang bya rog sgra //
translated: Nipita, and Kaki,🔽Divaviti, and Ulkika,

original: di b'a bi ta 'ug pa dang // ku mut 'byung gnas chu srin no //🔽dv'i ba panta mtsho dang chu //
analyzed: di b'a bi ta 'ug pa dang // ku mut 'byung gnas chu srin no // dv'i ba panta mtsho dang chu //
translated: Kumuda, and Makara,🔽Dvipa, and Dvipa,

original: dv'i pa ba t'i ri dang sa //
analyzed: dv'i pa ba t'i ri dang sa //
translated: Dvipavata, and Parvata,

original: dh'a ma ge tu nyi chen dang // skye dang gza' yi dbye ba la //
analyzed: dh'a ma ge tu nyi chen dang // skye dang gza' yi dbye ba la //
translated: [the chapter] on the great conjunction of the sun and moon, and the division of the planets and the asterisms,

original: n'a ga danta glang po'i so //
analyzed: n'a ga danta glang po'i so //
translated: [the chapter] on the elephant's tusk,

original: khyim du nges par ston pa'i shing //
analyzed: khyim du nges par ston pa'i shing //
translated: [the chapter] on the house, and the tree of the teacher,

original: n'a ga danti bum pa dang // dpal gyi lag ldan ma la'ang blta //
analyzed: n'a ga danti bum pa dang // dpal gyi lag ldan ma la'ang blta //
translated: [the chapter] on the elephant's tusk, the pot, and the glorious one with a hand,

original: na d'i kanta chu gter dang // rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang 'gro chu la //
analyzed: na d'i kanta chu gter dang // rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang 'gro chu la //
translated: [the chapter] on the ocean, the treasure of water, the ocean's retinue, and the river,

original: ni d'a kant'a dzambu yi //
analyzed: ni d'a kant'a dzambu yi //
translated: [the chapter] on the treasure of the Ganges,

original: khri shing bya rog byin pa dang // legs par rnam par grags pa'o //
analyzed: khri shing bya rog byin pa dang // legs par rnam par grags pa'o //
translated: the throne, the crow, the gift, and the one well-known,

original: nandy'a brta khyim bye brag / ta ba ra yi shing la'o //
analyzed: nandy'a brta khyim bye brag / ta ba ra yi shing la'o //
translated: [the chapter] on the joy of the family, the tree, and the cow,

original: ni r'a gri t'i kha ton med //
analyzed: ni r'a gri t'i kha ton med //
translated: [the chapter] on the one without a mantra,

original: so sor spong dang spel ba la //🔽nistu shi tam phra mor byas //
analyzed: so sor spong dang spel ba la // nistu shi tam phra mor byas //
translated: [the chapter] on the abandonment and increase of the individual,🔽[the chapter] on the one well-purified, the subtle one,

original: btang dang pags pa stong pa la //
analyzed: btang dang pags pa stong pa la //
translated: [the chapter] on the one who gives up, the one with a thousand skins,

original: ni: ka si ta nges phyin dang // ngan par byas dang steng du phan //
analyzed: ni: ka si ta nges phyin dang // ngan par byas dang steng du phan //
translated: [the chapter] on the one who definitely goes, the one who does evil, and the one who benefits above,

original: skang ba'i panytsa gu pta rus sbal dang // ts'arb'a ka yi mthong ba la //
analyzed: skang ba'i panytsa gu pta rus sbal dang // ts'arb'a ka yi mthong ba la //
translated: [the chapter] on the tortoise, the one with five hidden [parts], and the one who sees the charvakas,

original: pa ri ga tam shes dang bskor //
analyzed: pa ri ga tam shes dang bskor //
translated: [the chapter] on the one with knowledge, the one surrounded,

original: g-yang sa thob dang rnyed pa la //🔽pa ri gh'a ta yongs 'joms g-yul //🔽pa ri brta 'bru dang brje //
analyzed: g-yang sa thob dang rnyed pa la // pa ri gh'a ta yongs 'joms g-yul // pa ri brta 'bru dang brje //
translated: [the chapter] on the abyss, on the acquisition of wealth,🔽on the destruction of the enemy, on the battle,🔽on the exchange of grain,

original: rus sbal rgyal dang 'bros pa la //
analyzed: rus sbal rgyal dang 'bros pa la //
translated: on the tortoise, on the king, on the escape,

original: palla be tam ta ta dang // de rab 'jug dang rgya skyegs dmar //
analyzed: palla be tam ta ta dang // de rab 'jug dang rgya skyegs dmar //
translated: on the Pallava, on the Tamraparniyas, on the entrance, on the red lac,🔽on the parrot, on the pigeon, on the wild monkey, on the tinduka,

original: p'a r'a ba ta phug ron dang // ri skyes spre'u tinbu ka / s'a r'a ba ti sa skyong dang // dbyangs dang mdzes dang 'bras bu la //
analyzed: p'a r'a ba ta phug ron dang // ri skyes spre'u tinbu ka / s'a r'a ba ti sa skyong dang // dbyangs dang mdzes dang 'bras bu la //
translated: on the king of the earth, on the melody, on the beautiful, on the fruit,

original: p'a ri dz'a ta yongs bzang dang // mand'a ra dang lha yi shing //
analyzed: p'a ri dz'a ta yongs bzang dang // mand'a ra dang lha yi shing //
translated: on the excellent birth, on the Mandara, on the divine tree,

original: p'a shu pa ta phyugs bdag lha'i //
analyzed: p'a shu pa ta phyugs bdag lha'i //
translated: on the Pāśupata, on the god of cattle,

original: bu dang pa ka'i me tog can //
analyzed: bu dang pa ka'i me tog can //
translated: on the son, on the flower of the Pāka tree,

original: pu ra skri tam mdun du byas //
analyzed: pu ra skri tam mdun du byas //
translated: on the Puruscrita,

original: mngon par mchod pa dga' la'o //
analyzed: mngon par mchod pa dga' la'o //
translated: on the worship, on the joy,

original: mtshon cha khrus byas dgras bzung dang // bdag gir byas pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: mtshon cha khrus byas dgras bzung dang // bdag gir byas pa la yang ngo //
translated: on the weapon, on the ablution, on the seizure by the enemy, on the appropriation.

original: pushpa danta rigs 'dzin gyi //
analyzed: pushpa danta rigs 'dzin gyi //
translated: [The chapter] on the Puspadanta, on the particular of the Vidyādhara, on the elephant, on the elephant of the quarter,🔽on the elephant of the world, on the elephant of the ocean,🔽on the elephant of the mountain, on the elephant of the forest,🔽on the elephant of the king, on the elephant of the city,🔽on the elephant of the village, on the elephant of the house,🔽on the elephant of the family, on the elephant of the body,🔽on the elephant of the dream, on the elephant of the elephant,🔽on the elephant of the elephant of the elephant,

original: bye brag glang po phyogs kyi glang //
analyzed: bye brag glang po phyogs kyi glang //
translated: on the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant,🔽on the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant,🔽on the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant,🔽on the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant,🔽on the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant,🔽on the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant,🔽on the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant,🔽on the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the elephant of the

original: pra dz'a pa ti sa bdag dang ; / tshangs pa dang ni skye dgu'i bdag / pra ni hi tam bshad dang bkod //
analyzed: pra dz'a pa ti sa bdag dang ; / tshangs pa dang ni skye dgu'i bdag / pra ni hi tam bshad dang bkod //
translated: is explained as praṇihita, arranged,

original: thob dang mnyam par gzhag pa la //
analyzed: thob dang mnyam par gzhag pa la //
translated: attained, and equipoised.

original: pra ti ha ta dgra dang ni //
analyzed: pra ti ha ta dgra dang ni //
translated: Pratihata is an enemy,

original: so sor 'khrul dang bkag pa la //
analyzed: so sor 'khrul dang bkag pa la //
translated: and in each error, in prohibition.

original: pra ti batti lam dang sems //
analyzed: pra ti batti lam dang sems //
translated: Pratibaddha is a path, a mind,

original: gos byed gnas byed rab 'jug thob //
analyzed: gos byed gnas byed rab 'jug thob //
translated: a cloth maker, a place maker, a good engagement, an attainment,

original: spyod yul dang ni rab tu rtogs //
analyzed: spyod yul dang ni rab tu rtogs //
translated: a sphere of activity, and a thorough understanding.

original: yang dag rig dang cha la'o //
analyzed: yang dag rig dang cha la'o //
translated: It is in the correct knowledges and in the parts.🔽Pratikṛti is a composition,

original: pra ti kri ti bcos pa dang // gzugs brnyan dang ni mchod pa la //
analyzed: pra ti kri ti bcos pa dang // gzugs brnyan dang ni mchod pa la //
translated: a reflection, and an offering.

original: pra ti kshi p'a so sor thogs //
analyzed: pra ti kshi p'a so sor thogs //
translated: Pratikṣepa is an individual obstruction,

original: mngags pa dang ni sel ba la //
analyzed: mngags pa dang ni sel ba la //
translated: an envoy, and a removal.🔽Pradhūpita is an affliction

original: pra dh'u pi ta nyon mongs dang // nyi ma bgrod pa'i phyogs la'o //
analyzed: pra dh'u pi ta nyon mongs dang // nyi ma bgrod pa'i phyogs la'o //
translated: and a direction traversed by the sun.

original: pra bra dzi ta dka' thub mtha' //
analyzed: pra bra dzi ta dka' thub mtha' //
translated: Pravajitā is an ascetic end,

original: spang spos sman dang mgo zlum mo //
analyzed: spang spos sman dang mgo zlum mo //
translated: a discarded object, an incense, a medicine, and a shaven head.🔽Bhagavat is a cow,🔽a woman, a conqueror, a worthy one,

original: bha ga b'anta goo r'i dang // bud med @193b rgyal ba mchod 'os dang // zlos gar dang ni gar la'o //
analyzed: bha ga b'anta goo r'i dang // bud med @193b rgyal ba mchod 'os dang // zlos gar dang ni gar la'o //
translated: a dance, and a drama.

original: bho ga banta longs spyod can //
analyzed: bho ga banta longs spyod can //
translated: Bhoganandā is for the wealthy.

original: bho ga wa t'i klu yi grong //

analyzed: ba na s'a ti shing tsam dang // me tog 'bras med shing la'o //

analyzed: kha 'byed dang // spyod pa mngon par 'phags pa la //

analyzed: bee dz'a yanti ba dan dang // rgyal byed dang ni me bsrub la'o //

analyzed: sa d'a ga ti dri bzhon dang // rtag pa'i dbang phyug mya ngan 'das //

analyzed: sa mu dr'anta mtha' yas dang // ras ba la / (brgya byin/) dang ni spri ka'o //

analyzed: sa m'a hi tam kun tu 'dzin //

analyzed: bkod dang mnyam par bzhag pa la // sa ra svanta mtsho can dang // rgya mtsho dang ni /

analyzed: chu klung lha mo sa dang ngag / lha yi ri bo rnams la'o //

analyzed: su dh'a s'u ti mdzes pa dang // lus ngan gzhan pa dag la'o //

analyzed: s'urya bhakta nyi ma lha //

analyzed: bandhu dzi ba dag la'o //

analyzed: pus mo ba ni t'a dus mchod //

analyzed: p'i th'i khyim gyi snying po dang // phreng ba /

analyzed: zlos gar gzugs can lam //

original: rgyal pos byin dang chen po dang // bstan pa dang ni yi ge la //
analyzed: rgyal pos byin dang chen po dang // bstan pa dang ni yi ge la //
translated: Śrīghana is a king, a great one, a teaching, and a letter.

original: shi khin rgyal mtshan gza' dang me //
analyzed: shi khin rgyal mtshan gza' dang me //
translated: Śikhin is a banner, a planet, and fire.

original: rma bya dang ni bya gag mda' //🔽glang @203a * //
analyzed: rma bya dang ni bya gag mda' // glang @203a * //
translated: Śukla is a peacock, a cock, and an arrow.

original: dang ba ka /
analyzed: dang ba ka /
translated: Śaṅkha is an elephant, a cow,

original: ljon shing dang // gtsug phud ldan pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: ljon shing dang // gtsug phud ldan pa rnams la'o //
translated: a tree, and one who has a crest.

original: shilpin / shing bzo ba la'o //
analyzed: shilpin / shing bzo ba la'o //
translated: Śilpin is a carpenter.

original: shilpi ni ni sna can ma'o //
analyzed: shilpi ni ni sna can ma'o //
translated: Śilpinī is a nose.

original: shranggin / klung dang khyu mchog dang // ri bo shing dang mdzes pa dang // rnal 'byor dbye ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: shranggin / klung dang khyu mchog dang // ri bo shing dang mdzes pa dang // rnal 'byor dbye ba rnams la'o //
translated: Śṛṅga is a river, a bull, a mountain, a tree, a beautiful one, and a division of yoga.

original: shri gha na ni bde gshegs dang // dge slong la'o shr'i gha ni //
analyzed: shri gha na ni bde gshegs dang // dge slong la'o shr'i gha ni //
translated: Śrīghana is a Sugata, and a monk. Śṛṅgaṇa is

original: zho dang ni rda dag la'o //🔽shleshma ghanni / malli k'a //
analyzed: zho dang ni rda dag la'o // shleshma ghanni / malli k'a //
translated: [It is] curd and a pot.🔽[It is] a water-snake and a jasmine.

original: g-yo ldan dang ni dbu ba skyes //
analyzed: g-yo ldan dang ni dbu ba skyes //
translated: [It is] a deceitful one and a bubble.

original: sh'a sa na ni rlung dang dbugs //
analyzed: sh'a sa na ni rlung dang dbugs //
translated: [It is] the wind and breath.

original: myos byed shing la'o sadzdza na //
analyzed: myos byed shing la'o sadzdza na //
translated: [It is] a tree and a kind of liquor.🔽[It is] good, a kind of liquor, and a calculation.

original: legs pa'o / sadzdza n'a ni rtog / sadzdza nam ni gel pa byed //🔽sa da nam ni rta ra chu //
analyzed: legs pa'o / sadzdza n'a ni rtog / sadzdza nam ni gel pa byed // sa da nam ni rta ra chu //
translated: [It is] a calculation and a measure.

original: lus dang khang pa btung ba khyim //
analyzed: lus dang khang pa btung ba khyim //
translated: [It is] a horse, water, a house, and a home.

original: sant'a na ni rgyud dang rigs //
analyzed: sant'a na ni rgyud dang rigs //
translated: [It is] a stream and a family.

original: pha dang lha yi shing la'o //
analyzed: pha dang lha yi shing la'o //
translated: [It is] a father and a divine tree.

original: sam dh'a nam ni mngon skye dang // yang dag byed pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: sam dh'a nam ni mngon skye dang // yang dag byed pa la yang ngo //
translated: [It is] a concentration and a manifest birth, and also a correct action.

original: sandhi ni ni lus dang mdzes //
analyzed: sandhi ni ni lus dang mdzes //
translated: [It is] a body and a beauty.

original: dus dang ba bzhon dag la dran //
analyzed: dus dang ba bzhon dag la dran //
translated: [It is] a time and a vehicle.

original: sa ma ni ni mngon 'gro min //
analyzed: sa ma ni ni mngon 'gro min //
translated: [It is] a non-manifest going.

original: sa ma de ka dang mtshungs pa la //
analyzed: sa ma de ka dang mtshungs pa la //
translated: [It is] a sameness and an equality.

original: sampanna ni phun tshogs dang // ldan pa dang ni bsgrubs pa la //
analyzed: sampanna ni phun tshogs dang // ldan pa dang ni bsgrubs pa la //
translated: [It is] a perfection, a possession, and an accomplishment.

original: sam by'a nam ni bla gos khebs //
analyzed: sam by'a nam ni bla gos khebs //
translated: [It is] a covering and an upper robe.

original: sam pa nam ni mchod pa dang // zla ba nges par 'joms pa la 'dod //
analyzed: sam pa nam ni mchod pa dang // zla ba nges par 'joms pa la 'dod //
translated: [It is] an offering and the moon, and it is asserted to be a destroyer.

original: s'a d'i na shing rta /
analyzed: s'a d'i na shing rta /

original: rta can // gding ba la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rta can // gding ba la yang de bzhin no //
translated: [sādanam, with horses].🔽[sādanam, a carpet].

original: s'a dh'a nam ni mjug ma dang // zla skyes /
analyzed: s'a dh'a nam ni mjug ma dang // zla skyes /
translated: sādhana, a tail, one born in the month of Śravaṇa.

original: tshar zin shin tu grub //
analyzed: tshar zin shin tu grub //
translated: [sādhana, a very good accomplishment].🔽[sādhana, killing the constituents of death].🔽[sādhana, the Brahmā who causes going].

original: byed dang nye bar byed pa dang // shi ba'i 'du byed gsod pa dang // 'gro byed kyi tshangs pa dang // thabs dang sbyin du 'jug dang nags //
analyzed: byed dang nye bar byed pa dang // shi ba'i 'du byed gsod pa dang // 'gro byed kyi tshangs pa dang // thabs dang sbyin du 'jug dang nags //

original: s'a dh'a na ni mchod sbyin dang // las kyi mtha' dang mchod sbyin byed //
analyzed: s'a dh'a na ni mchod sbyin dang // las kyi mtha' dang mchod sbyin byed //

original: rab sems khrims lugs mtshams dang zhing //
analyzed: rab sems khrims lugs mtshams dang zhing //
translated: [sādhana, a good mind, a rule, a boundary, a field].

original: bum pa dang ni gnas la'o //
analyzed: bum pa dang ni gnas la'o //
translated: [sādhana, a pot, a place].

original: s'u tsam ni /
analyzed: s'u tsam ni /
translated: sūcanam,🔽[sūcanam, a manner, a view].

original: tshul drishka // dri dang / bsnun pa la yang ngo //🔽se tsa nam ni /
analyzed: tshul drishka // dri dang / bsnun pa la yang ngo // se tsa nam ni /

original: khrus gzhong dang // khrus dang 'gyur ba dag la yang //
analyzed: khrus gzhong dang // khrus dang 'gyur ba dag la yang //
translated: [sūcanam, bathing, a change].

original: se n'a n'i ni dmag dpon dang // 'dam bu skyes la'o /🔽se tsa n'am //
analyzed: se n'a n'i ni dmag dpon dang // 'dam bu skyes la'o / se tsa n'am //
translated: [sūcanam, a general, one born in a reed thicket].

original: khrus byed pa dang / bstan pa la //
analyzed: khrus byed pa dang / bstan pa la //
translated: [sūcanam, one who bathes, a doctrine].

original: sam sth'a nam ni dbyibs dang ni //
analyzed: sam sth'a nam ni dbyibs dang ni //
translated: [sāmantaka, a shape].

original: khyim dang shing dang / bzhi mdo la //
analyzed: khyim dang shing dang / bzhi mdo la //
translated: House, tree, and crossroads,🔽and the sound of thunder,

analyzed: sta na nam ni 'brug sgra dang // sgra tsam dang ni gam cham na'o //
translated: and mere sound, and the sound of weeping.🔽Standing is forest,

analyzed: sth'a ba nam ni nags tshal dang // ting nge 'dzin dang gtad pa la //

original: sparsha nam ni reg dang bu //
analyzed: sparsha nam ni reg dang bu //

original: sanda nam ni 'dzag dang chu //
analyzed: sanda nam ni 'dzag dang chu //

original: ti ni @203b ba dang shing rta la //
analyzed: ti ni @203b ba dang shing rta la //

analyzed: sva min khyab bdag sa ga'o // ta lin / zhing rmod pa dang stobs //

original: ha sa ni ni sol ba dang // so ba'o //
analyzed: ha sa ni ni sol ba dang // so ba'o //

original: ha sa nam dgod pa //
analyzed: ha sa nam dgod pa //

original: hasti ni ni gtso mo yi //
analyzed: hasti ni ni gtso mo yi //
translated: Hasti is the chief

original: dbye ba glang po'i chung ma la //
analyzed: dbye ba glang po'i chung ma la //

analyzed: h'a ya na ni lo tshigs dang // 'bru yi dbye ba'i don dag la //
